trans-unit.source: Represents the structure, or schema, of a data field.
trans-unit.target: Representa a estrutura ou o esquema de um campo de dados.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataSetFieldSchema class to get the properties of a data field using a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: Use a classe DataSetFieldSchema para obter as propriedades de um campo de dados usando um <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: You can discover the structure of a data field by using the following properties in this class: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.DataType%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.IsReadOnly%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.Length%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.Name%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.IsUnique%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode descobrir a estrutura de um campo de dados usando as seguintes propriedades dessa classe: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.DataType%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.IsReadOnly%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.Length%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.Name%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.IsUnique%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.IsUnique%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.Name%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.Length%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.IsReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.DataType%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.Identity%2A> property to determine if a data column is set for <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.PrimaryKey%2A> property to determine if a data column is in the primary key.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, você pode usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.Identity%2A>propriedade para determinar se uma coluna de dados está definida para <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>, ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.PrimaryKey%2A>propriedade para determinar se uma coluna de dados está na chave primária.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.PrimaryKey%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.Identity%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DataSetFieldSchema class is used by custom control designer components to provide information about a data field at design time.
trans-unit.target: A classe DataSetFieldSchema é usada pelos componentes do designer de controle personalizado para fornecer informações sobre um campo de dados em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: To examine the components of data using a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, use the following classes.
trans-unit.target: Para examinar os componentes de dados usando um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, use as seguintes classes.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema> - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetViewSchema> - DataSetFieldSchema
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema>- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetViewSchema>-DataSetFieldSchema</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetViewSchema> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema"></xref> class using a specified <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema"> </xref> classe usando um especificado <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema> class to examine the properties of a data field using a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> object.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema>classe para examinar as propriedades de um campo de dados usando um <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>objeto.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> object that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema"></xref> object describes.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref> do objeto que o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema"> </xref> descreve do objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of data stored in the data field.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de dados armazenados no campo de dados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> object that represents the type of data the data field contains.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Type>objeto que representa o tipo de dados que o campo de dados contém.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the value of the data field automatically increments for each new row added to the table or view.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o valor do campo de dados se incrementa automaticamente para cada nova linha adicionada à tabela ou exibição.

trans-unit.source: The Identity property corresponds to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A> property of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Identity corresponde à <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.DataType*> is numeric and the value of the column increments automatically as new rows are added to the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.DataType*>é numérico e o valor de incrementos de coluna automaticamente as novas linhas são adicionadas à <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.DataType*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref> é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data field is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o campo de dados é somente leitura; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether values in the data field are required to be unique.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se os valores no campo de dados precisam ser exclusivos.

trans-unit.source: The IsUnique property corresponds to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A> property of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade IsUnique corresponde à <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data in the data field is unique; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os dados no campo de dados são exclusivos; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the size of data that can be stored in the data field.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica o tamanho dos dados que podem ser armazenados no campo de dados.

trans-unit.source: The Length property corresponds to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.MaxLength%2A> property of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Length corresponde à <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.MaxLength%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.MaxLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes the column can store.
trans-unit.target: O número de bytes que a coluna pode armazenar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the data field.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do campo de dados.

trans-unit.source: The Name property corresponds to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> property of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de nome corresponde à <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the data field.
trans-unit.target: O nome do campo de dados.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the data field can accept <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o campo de dados pode aceitar <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The Nullable property corresponds to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A> property of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Nullable corresponde à <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data field can accept <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> values; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o campo de dados pode aceitar <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> valores; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum number of digits used to represent a numerical value in the data field.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número máximo de dígitos usados para representar um valor numérico no campo de dados.

trans-unit.source: The Precision property is required by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceFieldSchema> interface, but is not used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de precisão é necessário para a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceFieldSchema>interface, mas não é usado, a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceFieldSchema>

trans-unit.source: This property always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade sempre retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the data field is in the primary key for the containing table or view.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o campo de dados está na chave primária para a tabela ou exibição de conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data field is in the primary key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o campo de dados está na chave primária; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of decimal places to which numerical values in the data field are resolved.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de casas decimais para o qual os valores numéricos no campo de dados são resolvidos.

trans-unit.source: The Scale property is required by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceFieldSchema> interface, but is not used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema> class.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade escala é necessário para a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceFieldSchema>interface, mas não é usado, a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceFieldSchema>

trans-unit.source: This property always returns -1.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade sempre retorna -1.
